Html:
Whilst you can install Wolfpack via Sidewinder like this...

sidewinder.exe /p wolfpack /i installation_folder

..it would be good to make Wolfpack available via Chocolatey too. Any interest in packaging Wolfpack with some Chocolatey goodness?

Ok, so just tried to "cinst wolfpack", the existing wolfpack nuget package. All I have to do is include a chocolateyInstall.ps1 script to build a folder that contains both binaries and the config folder. I'll put a script together and will certainly include it in the next release.

BTW - Sidewinder does all of this right now, OOTB.
